net.sf.freecol.client.gui

Class Canvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JLayeredPane
            • javax.swing.JDesktopPane
              • net.sf.freecol.client.gui.Canvas
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public final class Canvas
extends javax.swing.JDesktopPane
    The main container for the other GUI components in FreeCol. This container is where the panels, dialogs and menus are added. In addition, this is the component in which the map graphics are displayed. Displaying panels and a dialogs

    Canvas contains methods to display various panels and dialogs. Most of these methods use i18n to get localized text. Dialogs return results, and may be modal or non-modal.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • showChoiceDialog

        public <T> T showChoiceDialog(Tile tile,
                              java.lang.Object obj,
                              javax.swing.ImageIcon icon,
                              java.lang.String cancelKey,
                              java.util.List<ChoiceItem<T>> choices)
        Displays a modal dialog with text and a choice of options.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type to be returned from the dialog.
        Parameters:
        tile - An optional Tile to make visible (not under the dialog!)
        obj - An object that explains the choice for the user.
        icon - An optional icon to display.
        cancelKey - Key for the text of the optional cancel button.
        choices - The List containing the ChoiceItems to create buttons for.
        Returns:
        The corresponding member of the values array to the selected option.

      • showColonyPanel

        public ColonyPanel showColonyPanel(Colony colony,
                                   Unit unit)
        Displays the colony panel of the given Colony. Defends against duplicates as this can duplicate messages generated by multiple property change listeners registered against the same colony.
        Parameters:
        colony - The colony whose panel needs to be displayed.
        unit - An optional Unit to select within the panel.
        Returns:
        The colony panel.
        See Also:
        ColonyPanel

      • showErrorMessage

        public void showErrorMessage(java.lang.String messageId)
        Displays an error message.
        Parameters:
        messageId - The i18n-keyname of the error message to display.

      • showErrorMessage

        public void showErrorMessage(java.lang.String messageId,
                             java.lang.String message)
        Displays an error message.
        Parameters:
        messageId - The i18n-keyname of the error message to display.
        message - An alternative (possibly non-i18n) message to display if the resource specified by messageId is unavailable.

      • showSaveDialog

        public java.io.File showSaveDialog(java.io.File directory,
                                   javax.swing.filechooser.FileFilter[] filters,
                                   java.lang.String defaultName)
        Displays a dialog where the user may choose a filename.
        Parameters:
        directory - The directory containing the files in which the user may overwrite.
        filters - The available file filters in the dialog.
        defaultName - Default filename for the savegame.
        Returns:
        The selected File.

      • showStatisticsPanel

        public void showStatisticsPanel(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> serverStats,
                                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> clientStats)
        Display the statistics panel.
        Parameters:
        serverStats - A map of server statistics key,value pairs.
        clientStats - A map of client statistics key,value pairs.
